transcript.text: Shalom Shalom Shalom this is daniel john
restaurant industries i just got back
from campus it's about little after two
o'clock in the afternoon i got there
around noon oh my goodness folks the
revival has officially begun at psu
you're not going to believe what
happened today i hope you can hear me
over this wind oh my goodness first of
all it was sunny as you can tell the
weather is very nice today it was cold
but not too cold I get out there at noon
and I start preaching on living holy
living sinless living without sin first
John three six through 11 just over and
over again I start exalting this keeping
all the Torah out of a love for Yahshua
Hebrews chapter 8 Jeremiah 31 Ezekiel of
a 19 folks oh my goodness all of the
hecklers who are so screaming in my face
yesterday who were so riding yesterday
when me and Mikhail were out those same
hecklers came out today and there was
such a spirit of sobriety their faces
look like they were broken they were
listening there were some mockler
mockers and hecklers I had to deal with
two prominent atheists but because i
knew what i was talking about and they
didn't I knew about the Roche limit I
knew about the scientific evidence that
the earth is young not old at the earth
is only 6,000 years of age not billions
of years old it quickly shut them up
there was a Roman Catholic who came out
who tried to uphold his Catholicism and
I ripped that to shreds just showing the
paganism of Christmas and Easter and and
and trying to pray to dead Saints like
Mary and that shut him up Joshua the
hypocrite he came out again but he was
much more sober and he was actually
asking questions in a semi humble
attitude it was amazing folks for hour
and a half from 12pm until one-thirty i
was virtually able to preach unhindered
trying out some 119 singing out songs
worshipping yah exalting his Torah
lifting up the blood atonement
talking about true science and then I
began to just spend a lot of time on
2014 being the beginning of the Great
Tribulation and I hope I wasn't covering
the speaker I think I might have just
been covering the speaker 2014 being the
beginning of the Great Tribulation and
2017 being when yasha returns I talked
about the Jewish Jubilee that Jesus
Yasha was crucified and rose again and
17 ad which is verified by the historian
Pliny talked about the Jewish Jubilee of
1917 were Britain for the first time in
hundreds of years gained control from
the Muslims of modern-day Palestinian
talked about the Jubilee of 1967 where
the Jews retook Jerusalem for the first
time in two thousand years talked about
the Jubilee of 2017 and what's going to
happen and I mean there was sobriety
usually I get all these hecklers and
people are just saying whatever Daniel
how do you know but there was intense
sobriety it was legitimate revival by
one-thirty afternoon I was so tired
because the hecklers were silent so
quickly that I was able to just preach
non-stop and so after an hour and a half
of almost non-stop preaching I was tired
but it was the most awesome day I've
ever had I mean next to yesterday with
me and McHale were there of course even
though it was good and the crowd was
huge they were very right is today the
crowd was still huge it was probably at
least 75 to 100 students but it was calm
it was sober the spirit of yah was
piercing hearts thank you for your
prayers the revival has begun at
Portland State University this is daniel
john lee with poorer restoration
ministries exalting the fullness of the
tour of moses out of a love for Yahshua
the Messiah of Israel through his blood
atonement and by the indwelling spirit
standing for the truth at Portland State
University this is daniel john lee the
websites wwc spirit intercom please join
us tonight at 7pm pacific-10 p.m.
eastern for a time of fellowship on
skype yah bless
Shalom
